          <title>
            <string language="en">Boiling points of water and alcohol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Siedepunkte des Wassers und des Spiritus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Points d'ébullition d'eau et alcool</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pontos fervendo da água e do álcool</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Punti di ebollizione di acqua e di alcool</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σημεία βρασμού του ύδατος και του οινοπνεύματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Puntas que hierven del agua y del alcohol</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that different liquids have different boiling points. Alcohol boils at a lower temperature than that of water.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Alcohol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">boil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">boiling point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Liquid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">melting point</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">steam</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">test tube</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß unterschiedliche 
Flüssigkeiten unterschiedliche Siedepunkte haben. 
Spiritusblutgeschwüre bei einer niedrigeren Temperatur als das 
des Wassers.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que les différents 
liquides ont différents points d'ébullition. Ébullitions 
d'alcool à une plus basse température que cela de l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que os líquidos 
diferentes têm pontos fervendo diferentes. Fervuras do álcool 
em uma temperatura mais baixa do que aquela da água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che i liquidi 
differenti hanno punti di ebollizione differenti. Boils 
dell'alcool ad una temperatura più insufficiente che quello di acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι τα διαφορετικά υγρά 
έχουν τα διαφορετικά σημεία βρασμού. Το οινόπνευμα βράζει 
σε μια χαμηλότερη θερμοκρασία από αυτή του ύδατος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que diversos líquidos 
tienen diversas puntas que hierven. Ebulliciones del alcohol en 
una temperatura más baja que el del agua.</string>
          </description>
